name: Rocketwave
description: Rocketwave is a charismatic oscilloscope-themed robot with a vibrant orange box body adorned with classic buttons. Its rocket arms and legs allow it to move swiftly and gracefully, while its screen displays a playful cat animation. To add to its cool factor, Rocketwave sports a stylish pair of shades as an accessory. This unique NFT robot is a proud member of the WebtrES club.
